CTASection.content: I'm Nicholas, dedicated to developing scalable cloud microserivces and React web apps.

paragraph.text: I nurture a relentless curiosity and a commitment to lifelong learning, which drove me to transition from HR to Software Development.
Following my initial BBA degree, I pursued a second Bachelor's in Computer Engineering.
My primary goal centers on crafting scalable, available cloud-based microservices using Java and Spring Boot, complemented by building responsive front-end solutions leveraging JavaScript and React.

projects.name: Inventory and Order Management System
projects.summary: Inventory and ordering system back by React and Spring Boot.

projects.name: Haircut Stylist Appointment Platform
projects.summary: A capstone project to showcase Node.Js and React skills.

projects.name: Personal Portfolio website
projects.summary: This is the website you're currently visiting. It was developed using React and Tailwind CSS.

projects.name: Microservices Demo
projects.summary: An elementary showcase of microservices implemented with Spring Boot.

projects.name: Spring MVC Login Demo
projects.summary: A basic demonstration of the login function can be illustrated using Spring Security and Spring MVC.

projects.name: Mouse Tracking
projects.summary: This mouse tracking application utilizes Machine Learning including CNN, YOLO5, and PyTorch to accurately track and identify the position of single or multiple mice within images and videos
